string.text:
A sleek, compact submachine gun designed for rapid, close-range engagements. Its lightweight build and high rate of fire make it ideal for quick, agile combat. With excellent control and a suppressor-compatible design, the MP9 is perfect for those who value stealth and speed, offering a deadly combination of mobility and firepower.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Switzerland
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Brugger & Thomet
